decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The staircase shall be used only in cases of emergency. Reason for condition:To ensure that the door and staircase is only used in cases of emergency, and to protect the amenities of the occupiers of adjoining residential properties.

Condition : 2 - Within a period of three months from the date of this permission the door at first floor level at the rear of No.81 The Broadway, providing access onto the fire escape staircase, shall be fitted with a suitable alarm system to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority and this alarm system shall be permanently maintained in good working order thereafter.  Reason for condition:To ensure that the door and staircase is only used in cases of emergency, and to protect the amenities of the occupiers of adjoining residential properties.
description: RETENTION OF AN EMERGENCY FIRE ESCAPE STAIRWAY AT REAR OF PREMISES.
